description: Being able to read 8 types of commonly used memory cards, this super-speed card reader is exactly what you need for convenient file transfer! By using a SanDisk 8GB UHS-1 SDHC card with our card reader, it has over 45MB/s read & 42MB/s write. Buy it now and feel the speed by yourself!
title: USB 2.0/3.0 Multiple Memory Card Reader support high speed card UHS-1 SDHC/SDXC/UDMA Compact Flash CompactFlash CF
